page_content: The page provides general recommendations for behavior during dry conditions and wildfire risks.
The page discusses the responsibilities of the Civil Protection unit in caring for the population during emergencies.
The page describes the AGIS Service Center's role in providing geoinformation infrastructure, including GIS software and licensing.
The page provides information about the Hunting Examination Commission and its members.
The page discusses the simultaneous election of the Municipal Council and the Mayor and Deputy Mayor, as well as the legal requirements for voting.
The page offers a ZIP file containing an EMF file that can be edited in text processing software like Office Word or OpenOffice. It includes instructions for editing.
The page provides information on how to use online maps, including features like measuring distances, printing maps, and obtaining property owner information.
The page discusses the current flood situation in the Kanton Aargau and the measures being taken to manage it.
The page provides instructions for PKI certification, including how to apply for and renew digital certificates for various administrative tasks.
The page discusses the strategies and measures for combating fire blight, a plant disease, in the Kanton Aargau.
